item.title: 2023 SWOT Analysis
item.description: Once I read an article about how to apply SWOT Analysis for personal career and strategies to in career development. The article most likely is Personal SWOT Analysis as I read a lot of articles from mindtools.com. When I read the article, I also found several strategies how to convert my weakness to strengths. I finally converted one of my weakness — English to one of my strengths in the past 5 years by keeping learning and practicing English.
